Хірургічна стоматологія – розділ медицин: Surgical dentistry is a section of medicine associated with surgical intervention on soft and solid tissues in the oral cavity. The number of types of surgical interventions and methods for their mouths are large enough. Our dental clinic is equipped with all necessary surgical procedures in the field of dentistry. Any operation conducted in our dental clinic, whether it is removing teeth, cutting clear or implantation is carried out caring and with the use of anesthesia. Surgical stomatology should not scare patients, and all actions occur with maximum comfort for the patient. Removal of teeth round-the-clock removal of teeth (elimination of the tooth root) - the most famous surgical manipulation for patients among others which in the oral cavity. The essence of it is to remove the tooth or its element of jaw bone with the help of special, adapted for different teeth and different situations in the tools. The procedure for removing teeth is carried out as low as possible, regardless of complexity (with minimal damage to surrounding tissues). This is necessary for the prevention of complications in the period of rehab, more rapid healing of the operating wound and reduce the size of the bone defect in the area of ​​the remote tooth. The latter is especially relevant in subsequent implantation, when it is significant every millimeter of bone tissue of a remote tooth. And, of course, the removal of teeth, as well as any surgical manipulation conducted under effective anesthesia.
Ми проводимо такі процедури: Лікування к: We conduct such procedures: treatment of caries. Doctors are used as traditional technologies of caries treatment, as well as a new method used in the stages of carious spots and does not involve mechanical action on the tooth. The dentist covers the tooth surface with a special gel, the basis of which is a resin. The substance fills the gust of the tooth and eliminates bacteria, which contributes to the discontinuation of the disease. The procedure suits patients with braces and takes a little more than half an hour. Treatment of pulpitis. Treatment of the disease involves depulsion (removal of the nerve by mechanical and medical method) and further filling of the tooth. Before and after the procedure, X-ray images are required that allow you to evaluate the structure of the channels and the quality of their filling.
Формувачі вкручуються в імпланти і завдя: Formers are twisted in implants and due to its smooth surface form conditions for maintaining in the area of the implantation of good hygiene, and also specify the shape for gums that are gumming around implants.After healing, gum molders are removed and their place is constant abutments with crowns.Advantages: accelerates the process of printing implants and bones;Primary stability improves;decreases the gaming period;The level of forecast increases;Risks are reduced with single-stage implantation.
Лікування ясен за одне відвідування. Суч: Gum treatment for one visit. Modern technologies allow you to quickly treat various gum disease. At the initial stage of the disease there is enough medical treatment and / or removal of a dental stone. In more launched cases, more serious procedures will be needed: Treatment by a VECTOR periodontal apparatus and a surgical diode laser. Such procedures allow to achieve a positive result only for one application. Gingivitis - inflammation of gums around the tooth. In the process of life, microbes release acids and enzymes that cause inflammation of gums and destruction of the binding of the tooth. Part of microbial plaque is mineralized by calcium saliva and turns into a dental stone. The rough surface of the stone is an ideal medium for fixing the biofilm and the propagation of microbes.
Скайс – це стильний аксесуар, який ненав: Skis is a stylish accessory that unobtrusively emphasizes your individuality and focuses on a flawless smile. Skies are called tiny, thin and flat crystals, which are installed on the surface of the tooth. Ornaments are made of precious and semi-precious stones and are subjected to special cutting, resulting in exquisite glow. The easiest option is glass skylines. As a rule, the decor of precious stones is installed on veneers or crowns, which allows you to securely fix skies and do not harm enamel.
Металокерамічні протези – це найбільш по: Metal-ceramic prostheses are the most common systems used to restore the anterior teeth and teeth of the chewing group. The advantages of designs are their reliability, strength and accessibility. Modern technologies and innovative materials allow us to prosthetize without pain. Features of metal-ceramic prostheses and specifics of their use. The metal ceramic prosthesis is equipped with a metal frame, which is applied to several layers of dental ceramics. For fixing crowns use cement (if the body of the tooth is not destroyed) or a metal tab. Dentists recommend prosthetic metal ceramics in cases when it is impossible to restore the tooth by sealing. The prosthesis allows you to solve a number of problems: abrasion of tissues, shinning in periodontents in mild form, large injuries that can not be adjusted with pads or veneers. Metal-ceramic structures are not applicable to: a strong bite defect; Bruxism (grinding teeth); Periodontitis and periodontal disease in severe form; A small height of teeth.
Чищення зубів ультразвуком – один із суч: Ultrasound brushing is one of the modern oral hygiene methods. With the help of a special device, the doctor removes plaque and other deposits, which allows you to keep your teeth health. Cleaning is carried out as an independent procedure, as well as other manipulations for treatment and restoration of teeth. Modern equipment and innovative technologies allow us to succeed even with complex problems. Features of the ultrasonic cleaning procedure are carried out using a skiller, which involves setting the depth and frequency of oscillations. Due to this, the specialist can pick up optimal parameters of efficient plaque removal, deposits in a particular patient without compromising enamel. The procedure takes no more than 1 hour and includes the following steps: the removal of a stone that is above / under the gums; Eliminating soft deposits; Deep cleaning of periodontal pockets with water; Polishing surface of the tooth special paste; Teeth will become lighter by 1-2 tones without the use of aggressive chemicals.
З тих чи інших причин у більшості доросл: For certain reasons in most adults there is a bite break. Uncatched in childhood bite, as a rule, in adulthood, is very rare. Some patients do not know about such an opportunity. Others unwilling to wear orthodontic designs. Third simply do not see important grounds for conducting such treatment. Correction of adult bite is a special topic for a conversation, which requires a scattering of many myths and destruction of stereotypes that have developed. Most often correction of bite in adults occurs with the help of bracket systems. Braces exactly the effort to move your teeth. Modern braces are not only effective, but also aesthetic. At the desire of the patient, it can be installed by linguistic bracket systems or sapphire braces that are small enough on the teeth. And if the patient wants to somehow stand out from the crowd, and does not ashamed of the fact of wearing braces, then multicolored braces, which are more similar to jewelry. Braces (all types): metal, ceramic, sapphire, ligvating (invisible). Elainers: Modern alternative to braces, innovative bite correction technologies.
